channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational ClearCase
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational ClearCase

item.title: CVE-2019-4059|2024-09-17T02:20:40.715Z -- ibm -- rational%20clearcase
item.description: IBM Rational ClearCase 1.0.0.0 GIT connector does not sufficiently protect the document database password. An attacker could obtain the password and gain unauthorized access to the document database. IBM X-Force ID: 156583.
